content: midas hat by laura reinbach this slouchy hat uses your lovely skein of sock yarn that you don t want to turn into socks the world wouldn t be able to see the gorgeous colors if they were hidden under pants or in boots the midas hat is provisionally cast on and knit in the round in stockinette which i think really showcases beautifully dyed yarn it features a folded brim to maintain the clean all stockinette stitch without a rolled edge plus the brim is wide enough to cover your ears and keep them warm it uses an elizabeth zimmerman technique that helps keep the brim from flaring out which can happen with folded hems size one size 20 circumference yarn 1 skein of the woolen rabbit pearl sock weight yarn in midas touch colorway or 300 yds sock/fingering weight yarn gauge 26sts and 40 row/4 in stockinette st with us size 3 3 25mm needles needles 1 1 16 us size 3 3 25mm needle 2 1 set us size 3 3 25mm dpns 3 another 16 circular needle of similar size used to hold the live stitches from the provisional cast on when seaming the folded brim notions 1 scrap yarn for provisional cast on 2 crochet hook for provisional cast on 3 stitch marker s to mark beginning of round and decreases if desired 4 tapestry needle to weave in tail and ends abbreviations k knit p purl co cast on m1 make one pm place marker decrease decrease sts stitches k2tog knit two stitches together dpns double pointed needles links for provisional cast on https //www youtube com/watch v=r3j-sux_whe http //techknitting blogspot com/2006/12/provisional-casting-on html instructions brim with scrap yarn provisionally cast on 117 sts pm and join in the round being careful not to twist k for a total of 28 rounds round 29 increase round *k9 m1 repeat from * to end of round 130sts round 30 k next p one round next k for 30 rounds now you will create the folded brim place live stitches from provisional cast on edge onto spare circular needles fold brim inward so the wrong sides are facing each other and the cast on edge is in the inside part of the hat with working yarn and needles in front align the needle with the cast on edge behind insert needle as if to knit into front stitch and then into the stitch on the needle behind see picture below knit these two stitches together *repeat for 9 sts total then k1 from front needle only repeat from * to end of round hat body knit until hat measures 9 or desired length start decreases *k11 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k10 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k9 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k8
